channel.title: Soulsplit Cache for those who need it
channel.description:
the real soulspit cache link is down so heres a reupload
the soulsplit cache link is dead so heres a download
[url=http://www.atomicupload.net/download/152/Soulspit_Cache.rar.html]Atomic Upload - Free File Hosting[/url]
Server And client minor
[url=http://www.atomicupload.net/download/153/Soul_Split_Server_Client.rar.html]http://www.atomicupload.net/download/153/Soul_Split_Server_Client.rar.html[/url]
Credits 100% To ZRSPS
How to fix the Client not loading because of the cache
Open cachedownloader.java replace the cache download url with this make sure u make it as zip and rename to cache!
[code]http://www.atomicupload.net/index.php?temp=ecd3f4bcbc052b3cb6bb5b90b8a90fce[/code] the client should now work perfectly
